xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.10 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhūduka » 10.10.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
Mahantaraduka
Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhūduka
Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu
316.
3093Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (Yathā cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānadukaṃ evaṃ imampi dukaṃ, ninnānākaraṇaṃ.)
3094Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhūdukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 10.10.1--7 Paṭiccādivāraup10.11 Cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiduka >>
